### ‚ùó Logs (Essential)
**How to get logs (Official/Packaged Version):**
1.  Open the app.
2.  Click the **blue button** in the bottom right corner.
3.  The log window will open.
4.  Press **Ctrl + A** to select all text, then copy and paste it into the box below.

**How to get logs ("Preview" Version from GitHub):**
* Paste the entire output you see in your terminal/console when running the script.

<details>
  <summary>CLICK HERE TO PASTE LOGS</summary>

(Paste your logs here)

</details>
